name: Crystal Hustle - A Breaking Bad Fan Game
name_original: Crystal Hustle - A Breaking Bad Fan Game
description:
100% LORE FRIENDLY BREAKING BAD FANGAME (NO FLYING CARS WHY WOULD YOU ASK THAT)

Play as Jesse Pinkman, dealing the infamous product around town.

Go from dead drop to dead drop, avoid the feds, and get the best score on the world-wide leaderboard!*

(Source Code available soon: https://www.patreon.com/fabianvelander)

*internet required for leaderboards (duh)

PATCHES 1.2:

* no more infinite cops if losing to time out

1.1:

* can now hide in bushes

* can not fly off slopes

* can not see wall of world
